pullrequest.title: Utilities for test suites, PY2 constant, minor version bump, smarter check_version()

content.raw: Because it's a little bit of a pain in the neck to switch *back* after switching to qtutils 2.0.0, and because there is other work happening that is based on it, I figure problems will be detected just as fast if it's merged now, and that testers aren't likely to revert unless bugs are showstoppers anyway. It's nice to keep the tip of the default branch 'stable', but these changes have seen a bit of testing already so I think it's ok to take the plunge (and Phil has indicated that he doesn't mind).

It's nice to keep the tip of the default branch 'stable', but these changes have seen a bit of testing already so I think it's ok to take the plunge (and Phil has indicated that he doesn't mind).
